title: Samsung expands Galaxy Ring sizes: New sizes 14 and 15 available starting January 22 - The Financial Express
summary:
Samsung expands Galaxy Ring sizes: New sizes 14 and 15 available starting January 22

Publication Date: January 22, 2025 | Source: Financial Express

Samsung is set to expand its Galaxy Ring lineup by introducing new sizes 14 and 15, available from January 22. The larger sizes aim to cater to a broader range of users and enhance competition with other smart ring manufacturers.

  • New sizes 14 and 15 will be available from January 22, 2025.
  • Galaxy Ring to come in three colors: Titanium Black, Silver, and Gold.
  • Samsung aims to compete with Oura, which offers sizes 4 to 15.
  • Galaxy Ring to be accessible in 53 markets by February 2025.
  • Samsung is enhancing the Health app to support the Galaxy Ring with sleep improvement features.
“The addition of larger sizes ensures that more individuals, particularly those at the higher end of the sizing spectrum, can comfortably use the device.”

This expansion reflects Samsung's commitment to accommodating a wider customer base while enhancing product integration through health-focused features in its applications.
newTitle: Samsung Expands Galaxy Ring Sizes with New Offerings

title: New Snapdragon 8s Elite detailed, seen powering the iQOO Z10 Turbo Pro - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
Samsung is adding two new Galaxy Ring sizes - The Verge
summary:
Samsung Introduces Two New Sizes for Galaxy Ring

Publication Date: January 22, 2024

Source: Samsung News

Samsung is expanding the availability of its Galaxy Ring by introducing sizes 14 and 15, allowing more people to find their fit.

  • The new sizes will be available starting January 22nd.
  • Galaxy Ring sizes now range from five to 15, varying in availability by market.
  • The new sizes aim to compete with Oura, which offers its smart ring in sizes four to 15.
  • Current larger sizes 12 and 13 feature bigger batteries for longer life.
  • The launch will also see the Galaxy Ring sold in 16 additional countries from February 7th.
“Even if you’re able to slide the ring on, it could be hard to take it off again as your fingers swell.” - Victoria Song

With these additions, Samsung aims to cater to a wider audience and enhance user experience across different markets.
newTitle: Samsung Introduces Two New Sizes for Galaxy Ring

Xiaomi Pad 7 With iPad-Like Display Launched In India: Price, Features - News18
summary:
Xiaomi Pad 7 With iPad-Like Display Launched In India: Price, Features

Date: January 13, 2025

Source: News18

Xiaomi Pad 7 has launched in India featuring a new Snapdragon Gen chipset and a nano-textured display, positioning itself as a competitor to the iPad.

Key Points:

  • Costs Rs 27,999 for the 8GB+128GB variant and Rs 30,999 for the 12GB+256GB variant.
  • Features a 144Hz refresh rate, 360Hz touch sampling rate, and Dolby Vision support.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chip with Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0.
  • Equipped with a 13MP rear camera and an 8MP front camera.
  • Includes a large 8,850 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.
“We are hoping Xiaomi does not change its Android promise with the Pad 7 which was recently confirmed for the previous model.”

The Xiaomi Pad 7 represents a significant upgrade in the tablet market in India, particularly for mid-range devices.
newTitle: Xiaomi Pad 7 Launched in India: Features and Pricing

Bigger, Smarter, Better: The Best TVs Unveiled at CES 2025 - Analytics Insight
summary:
Bigger, Smarter, Better: The Best TVs Unveiled at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Tech News

The curtains have closed on CES 2025, but the buzz surrounding its futuristic TV lineup still has tech enthusiasts abuzz. This year's exhibition showcased cutting-edge displays, smart capabilities, and entertainment solutions that are redefining the boundaries of innovation.

  • LG’s Rollable OLED TV: Features improved rolling mechanism and light intensity, aimed at revolutionizing home entertainment.
  • Samsung Neo QLED TV: Designed specifically for gaming with low input lag and high refresh rate, utilizing AI Quantum Mini LEDs.
  • Sony A95L: Quantum Dot OLED technology producing 200% more colors, includes eco-friendly power-saving features.
  • Hisense 8K TV: Affordable 8K model priced under $3,000, offers excellent quality and performance.
  • TCL’s 115-inch Mini-LED TV: World’s largest Mini-LED TV with new local dimming capabilities for optimum display.

Quick Stats

  • 48% of attendees prefer TVs with AI features.
  • Over 70% of new TVs focus on being eco-friendly.

2025 is shaping up to be an exciting year for home entertainment with the arrival of impressive new TVs that promise to elevate the viewing experience.
newTitle: Bigger, Smarter, Better: The Best TVs Unveiled at CES 2025

Oppo is poised to take the spotlight with its upcoming Oppo Find N5, claiming it will be the thinnest foldable phone in the world, significantly thinner than current models.

summary:
OPPO Reno13 Review: A Beautiful Blend of Style and Performance

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: CNBC TV18

The OPPO Reno13 5G combines stunning design with powerful performance, intended as a strong mid-range smartphone option.

  • Price starts at ₹37,999.
  • Available in Luminous Blue and Ivory White colors, with the Blue variant featuring a unique glowing effect.
  • Thin design at 7.29mm and weighs 181g, made with aerospace-grade aluminum and glass.
  • Features a 6.59-inch 120Hz smart adaptive display with 1.5K resolution.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor, ensuring smooth performance.
  • Equipped with a 5,600mAh battery and 80W fast charging.
  • Camera setup includes a 50MP main camera, an 8MP ultra-wide-angle, and a 2MP monochrome lens.
  • Special underwater photography capabilities allow for shooting up to 2 meters deep for 30 minutes.
"The OPPO Reno13 5G combines style, new ideas, and top-notch performance."

The OPPO Reno13 stands out as a stylish, high-performance smartphone suited for users looking for quality under ₹40,000.

summary:

Published On: Jan 13, 2025

Source: India Today

Flipkart has launched its Republic Day sale, known as the Monumental Sale, which runs until January 19. The sale features substantial discounts on the iPhone 16 series and other popular smartphones.

  • iPhone 16 is priced at Rs 67,999 with a discount of Rs 12,000 from its launch price of Rs 79,999.
  • iPhone 16 Plus now available for Rs 79,999 with a total discount of Rs 9,901.
  • iPhone 16 Pro discounted to Rs 1,12,900, down from Rs 1,19,900.
  • iPhone 16 Pro Max selling at Rs 1,37,900, down from Rs 1,44,900.
“Prices are higher for different color models of the iPhone 16 Pro.”

Despite potential changes in pricing, customers can enjoy significant savings during this ongoing sale.

Mark Your Calendars! The Next Blue Moon Arrives on May 31, 2026 - Gadgets 360
summary:
Mark Your Calendars! The Next Blue Moon Arrives on May 31, 2026

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Gadgets360

A Blue Moon, a term often associated with rarity, will next occur on May 31, 2026. This event refers to the second full moon within a single calendar month, arising due to the lunar cycle of approximately 29.5 days.

  • The upcoming Blue Moon will be of the monthly variety.
  • The last Blue Moon was recorded on August 19, 2024.
  • The term Blue Moon does not mean the moon turns blue.
Instances of the moon appearing blue are exceedingly rare.

The next seasonal Blue Moon is anticipated on August 21, 2032.
newTitle: Mark Your Calendars! The Next Blue Moon Arrives on May 31, 2026

title: Gemini Live could soon chat with you about your files, and here's a demo of it (APK teardown) - Android Authority
summary:
Gemini Live could soon chat with you about your files, and here's a demo of it (APK teardown)

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Android Authority

Google is working on extending the file upload feature of Gemini Advanced to Gemini Live, enabling users to have conversations about their files.

  • Google is exploring ways to enhance Gemini Advanced, an AI assistant.
  • Gemini Live will allow users to upload files and engage in conversations regarding those files.
  • The feature was activated in Google app v16.1.38 beta, demonstrating the potential for contextual responses from file data.
“Using the Gemini Live interface instead of the standard Gemini interface will be helpful for its conversational approach.”

File uploads are not currently available in Gemini Live, but updates will follow when the feature is launched.
newTitle: Gemini Live could soon chat with you about your files, and here's a demo of it (APK teardown)

title: Samsung Leads Sleep Technology With Galaxy Ring Expansion and Samsung Health App Update - Samsung Global Newsroom
summary:
Galaxy Ring’s size and market expansion plus advanced sleep and mindfulness features enhance your sleep health

Date: January 2025 Source: Samsung Electronics

Samsung Electronics has announced the expansion of its Galaxy Ring line, now offering sizes 5 to 15 and reaching 53 markets. Alongside this, the Samsung Health app will gain new features aimed at improving sleep quality.

  • Galaxy Ring is extending its sizes to include two larger options, available in 15 new markets starting February.
  • The Samsung Health app will now feature a Sleep environment report, Sleep time guidance, and a Mindfulness tracker.
  • Galaxy Ring focuses on comfort and user-friendly wellness tracking, highlighting sleep health since its July 2024 launch.
“With this expansion, Samsung is reaffirming its commitment to improving sleep health through innovative technology.”

Samsung continues to enhance its wearable technology to support better health outcomes for users.

POCO started 2025 strong with the launch of the X7 smartphone, which provides excellent features at an attractive price.

The POCO X7 features a 50MP triple-camera, an ergonomic design, and a vibrant 6.67-inch AMOLED display. It stands out in the market for its combination of performance, camera capabilities, and build quality.

The POCO X7 is positioned as a strong contender in its price range, offering notable features and performance, making it appealing for budget-conscious consumers.

MacOS Users Beware, New Version Of Banshee Stealer Malware Out To Get Your Data - News18
summary:
MacOS Users Beware: New Version Of Banshee Stealer Malware Out To Get Your Data

Date: January 13, 2025

Source: News18

The Banshee Stealer malware is targeting macOS users, aiming to steal sensitive data like browser credentials and cryptocurrency wallet details. First discovered in mid-2024, this malware is now circulating in advanced forms that evade detection.

  • Banshee Stealer is sold for $3,000 on underground forums.
  • A new variant uses a string encryption method from Apple’s XProtect engine.
  • The malware remains undetected for extended periods, potentially over two months.
  • It employs advanced technology to extract sensitive information quietly.
“It operates silently within the system, pilfering everything from browser credentials and cryptocurrency wallet details to even macOS passwords.”

To protect against Banshee Stealer, users are advised to avoid downloading files from unknown sources, regularly update their macOS, and remain vigilant for suspicious password prompts.
newTitle: MacOS Users Beware: New Version Of Banshee Stealer Malware Out To Get Your Data

Apple Vision Pro 2 set for 2026, budget model in development for future release: Mark Gurman | Mint - Mint
summary:
Apple Vision Pro 2 Set for 2026, Budget Model in Development: Mark Gurman

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Bloomberg

Tech giant Apple is reportedly gearing up to develop a successor to its Vision Pro mixed-reality headset, with a launch expected in 2026 according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman.

Launch Timeline and Features

The Vision Pro 2 might debut between autumn 2025 and spring 2026, featuring Apple’s next-gen M5 chipset and improvements to its user interface.

Affordable Vision Pro Model in Development

Apple is also working on a budget-friendly variant of the headset, which may be launched after 2027 with cost-saving compromises.

  • Apple Vision Pro 2 launching in 2026.
  • Expected to include M5 chipset.
  • Affordable version in development, but delayed launch.
“The primary upgrades are likely to be under the hood.” - Mark Gurman

This continued innovation in mixed-reality headsets reflects Apple's commitment to enhancing user experience while expanding their product offerings.
newTitle: Apple Vision Pro 2 Set for 2026, Budget Model in Development: Mark Gurman
